sentences.sentence: I had no time or inclination to philander.
sentences.translation: 我是没有时间拈花惹草的，也不喜欢。

sentences.sentence: Prices will rise, Politicians will philander , you too will get old.
sentences.translation: 物价会上涨；政客会逢场作戏；你也会变老。

sentences.sentence: We shouldn't philander solemnly with that point of view. On the contrary, weshould treat it seriously.
sentences.translation: 我们不应该貌似认真地对待这一观点，相反，我们应该认真严肃地对待它。
